segments.text: Oh, this is just too much fun to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and their mom has no idea what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, reaching for the cookie jar, and it looks like he's about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how his sister is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, like it's the most natural thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing from the sink, and the mom is just standing there, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how unaware she is of everything going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids must be so excited to be getting away with this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before and know they can get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like watching a little heist movie, right here in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, just this once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's so much fun to watch them being so sneaky and clever.
segments.speaker: PAR
